item.title: Reading 03: PC Gaming Master Race
item.description: The biggest differences, for me, about gaming on a personal computer vs a video console are the number of options.

item.title: Reading 02: Beauty in Simplicity
item.description: In my opinion, the thing that makes the games of the golden age so memorable is definitely their simplicity.

item.title: Reading 00: A Mutual Relationship
item.description: Traditional board games and modern video games today have a relationship that is very back and forth.
